description.p: Aasmodai are the offspring of celestial and infernal bloodlines, embodying divine grace and infernal power in one form. With radiant eyes, shadowed wings, and skin that flickers between light and flame, they inspire awe and fear in equal measure. Most Aasmodai stand tall and proud, with glowing tattoos or markings representing their dual nature.

Aasmodai are rare and often solitary, not fitting into traditional celestial or fiendish orders. Many are driven by a desire to define their own purpose, often becoming warriors, scholars, or prophets. Their struggle to balance divine judgment and infernal passion defines their worldview.

Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.
Age.Aasmodai mature at a similar rate to humans and live up to 120 years.
Alignment.Aasmodai tend toward neutrality, pulled between two extremes.
Size.You are Medium.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision.You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.
Infernal Resilience.You have resistance to necrotic damage.
Innate Magic.You know the sacred flame and fire bolt cantrips. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
Martial Balance.You are proficient in simple and martial weapons.
Divine Duality (1/Long Rest each).You can undergo one of two transformations per long rest, each lasting 1 minute:
Angelic Transformation: emit bright light in 60 ft, unarmed strikes deal radiant damage, flying speed of 30 ft, resistance to radiant and necrotic.
Demonic Transformation: breath weapon (15 ft cone, 3d6 fire, Dex save), flying speed of 30 ft, resistance to fire and necrotic.
Religious Intuition.You are proficient in the Religion skill.
Languages.You can speak, read, and write Common, Celestial, and Infernal.
